fields.name: Alignment:
fields.value:
Rebel Misdirection
**Attack**
None
**Defense**
None
**Abilities:**
- Grift two players at night.
**Attributes:**
- With the Rebel Flag, you can take gunpoint and grift at the same time.
- Your targets will visit whoever the other selected.
The target that is switched in the case of a Disguiser is the non-Mafia target.
Jailors, Veterans, Survivors, Werewolves (non-full moon), control immune roles, and roles without abilities are immune. In this case, the grift will fail and neither player will receive a message.
If any role that can self-target is grifted, the other grifted will target themself.
If a Mafioso is grifted and there is a non-roleblocked/jailed Godfather, the grift will go through but have no effect.
- Your targets will receive the ‘You were transported to another location.’ message.
- You cannot be risen by a Retributionist, Necromancer, or Archivist.
**Goal:**
Kill all who oppose the Rebellion.
